game.name: Dunk Hit
game.description:
The first time on the internet you can find a basketball game where potting the ball can give you the matchless fun and entertainment of long hours! Would you like to try your hands and show off the world you are a wonderful basketball player? Join Dunk Hit and be prepared to dunk the basketball in a limited period of time! It is not going to be easy since you have to put the ball in the goal before the timer runs out.

Your quick reflexes and good command over the ball help to score higher points. Make sure to push the ball at the right time to score in this HTML5 sports game. Put your finger on your mouse to click or tap the screen on your mobile phone to push your ball moving and jumping forward towards the basket! Scoring a goal will reward you a point and allow you to try your hand in the next point.  Earn points by dunking the ball and then you move to the next level!

Keep bouncing the ball through multiple levels and become a champion of basketball! Remember the multiplier will reset if you miss a ball. Do fast since you have only a couple of seconds to make your shot! The multiplier bonus will increase if you succeed in making a subsequent perfect shot. Try to be precise and quick to score one or more points in this cool basketball game! Be careful as overshooting the ball leads you to a failure! Good luck to have a blast online, no download required on atmegame.com!
game.metaTitle: Dunk Hit Games - Play Online Free : Atmegame.com
game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Dunk Hit at atmegame.com ! We have selected this  games for best excitement and thrill in you!
